Parameter.name: DB_TYPE
Parameter.description: database to use, can be sqlite or tinydb

Parameter.name: DB_PATH
Parameter.description: sqlite application database to persist config and app state

Parameter.name: PERF_FILE_PATH
Parameter.description: file for performance stat dumps

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_MAIN
Parameter.description: haiot node intercomm. topic

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_OPENHAB_SEND
Parameter.description: openhab integration mqtt channel for sending to openhab

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_OPENHAB_RECEIVE
Parameter.description: openhab integration mqtt channel for receiving

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_OWNTRACKS_RECEIVE
Parameter.description: owntracks integration mqtt channel for receiving

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_SONOFF_1
Parameter.description: sonoff-tasmota integration mqtt channel

Parameter.name: MQTT_TOPIC_MICRO
Parameter.description: mqtt publish channel for micropython devices

Parameter.name: DDNS_RACKSPACE_CONFIG_FILE
Parameter.description: conf for ddns, stored in user home. uses http://ip-api.com/docs/api:json

Parameter.name: LASTFM_CONFIG_FILE
Parameter.description: conf for lastfm & libre

Parameter.name: DB_REPORTING_LOCATION_ENABLED
Parameter.description: 1 for recording data, 0 disabled

Parameter.name: P_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD
Parameter.description: gap in degrees before turning on / off heat, to avoid rapid on/off cycles

Parameter.name: P_PRESENCE_MOVE_GAP
Parameter.description: minutes with no move to pass before considering presence status as away

Parameter.name: P_HEAT_ON_AUTO_INTERVAL
Parameter.description: minutes of move to trigger auto heat on action

Parameter.name: P_HEAT_OFF_AUTO_INTERVAL
Parameter.description: minutes of inactivity to trigger auto heat off action

Parameter.name: P_NEWTIFY_KEY
Parameter.description: api source key

Parameter.name: P_HIPCHAT_TOKEN
Parameter.description: room token

Parameter.name: P_HIPCHAT_ROOM_API_ID
Parameter.description: room api id

Parameter.name: P_MPD_SERVER
Parameter.description: IP of mpd music server

Parameter.name: P_MPD_PORT_ZONE
Parameter.description: mpd port for each music zone, can use multiple names for a zone, separated by :

Parameter.name: GMUSICPROXY_URL
Parameter.description: url for gmusicproxy

Parameter.name: AMP_SERIAL_HOST
Parameter.description: host for serial over net - ser2net, amp control

Parameter.name: AMP_SERIAL_PORT
Parameter.description: port for serial over net - ser2net, amp control

Parameter.name: ALEXA_WEMO_LISTEN_PORT
Parameter.description: starting port to be used to listen by alexa wemo devices

Parameter.name: HEAT_SOURCE_MIN_TEMP
Parameter.description: minimum temperature to consider a heat source usable

Parameter.name: HEAT_STATE_REFRESH_PERIOD
Parameter.description: period in minutes to do a heath status & gpio pins refresh

Parameter.name: MAX_DELTA_TEMP_KEEP_WARM
Parameter.description: max delta in degrees for a keep warm zone to be started

Parameter.name: SOLAR_APS_LOCAL_URL
Parameter.description: link to aps ecu page with day production

Parameter.name: SOLAR_APS_LOCAL_REALTIME_URL
Parameter.description: link to aps ecu page with realtime production

Parameter.name: SOLAR_UTILITY_NAME
Parameter.description: utility name from utility table

Parameter.name: ATREA_LOCAL_URL
Parameter.description: link to atrea ventilation system web server

ZoneCustomRelay.gpio_pin_code: TZ69 Smart energy plug in switch_4
TZ69 Smart energy plug in switch_5

SchedulePattern.name: week-boiler-winter
SchedulePattern.pattern: hhhh hhhh hhhh hhhh hhhh hhhh

SchedulePattern.name: week-boiler-summer
SchedulePattern.pattern: iiii iiii iiii iiii iiii iiii

SchedulePattern.name: fridge-summer
SchedulePattern.pattern: xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx

SchedulePattern.name: boiler-summer
SchedulePattern.pattern: zzzz zzzz zzzz zzzz zzzz zzzz

_disabled.sensor_address: TZ69 Smart energy plug in switch_5
TZ69 Smart energy plug in switch_4
ZMNHTDx Smart meter S4 S5 S6_2
